content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I assist you with your HVAC needs today?
I need my AC fixed ASAP. Don’t wanna give you all my info though.
I totally understand needing quick help! To schedule a visit, may I please have your name and address to make sure we can serve your area?
Nope, don’t wanna share that. Just send someone over soon.
I’m here to help, but we do need your address so our technicians can reach you. Are you able to share just the street name or zip code?
I’m not comfortable giving that. Y’all should come to my place anyway, it’s urgent!

I understand the urgency and want to get your AC fixed quickly! Unfortunately, we can't schedule a service without knowing your location to ensure we're sending the right technician. Could you please share at least your zip code?
I just want the repair, not a quiz. Can’t you just send someone by?
I want to help as much as possible, but our system requires an address to confirm service availability and schedule. If you prefer, I can connect you to a human operator for further assistance.
reason: customer refused to provide necessary info
